website_summaries.verdict: Great starter set to experiment with a variety of colors.
pros: Owners love that every color in the set is wearable
Long- lasting, with touch-ups rarely needed
Right size for travel and purses
Shades are perfect for day or night
cons: Some reviewers complain that the shadows are too small – each is dime size

customer_reviews.title: Great pallette for every day
customer_reviews.text: I'm medium skin tone, blonde -- all colors with the exception of the very dark brown are a good fit for me. Longlasting, doesn't seem to dust off at all although it fades a bit by the end of a busy work day. But then, so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Cat in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not what they appear online.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this 2 mins ago. So disappointed. The pic looks like there are pink hues, and that’s what I wanted. Not what I got. It’s all browns and yellow hues. Not even any peach. Also, didn’t realize before but there’s no returns. Will only buy in store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Q.

customer_reviews.title: I'll find something way cheaper and just as good at Ulta
customer_reviews.text: Price is too high. I'll find something way cheaper and just as good at Ulta. It will be a brand name as well.
customer_reviews.author: VRG80

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than YOU Imagine 3in x 3in
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing: when people said small, I thought it was reasonably small. Like the size of my 5s iPhone, just a little wider. This thing is SMALL. It is 3x3. The shadows don't even take up most of that space. It's about half the size of my iPhone 6s. I would give it less stars, but the pigments and colors are great. But mostly I find that it just isn't worth $45. The individual shades of MAC shadows are much larger, or you could just buy a Pro-size pallet. Love the colors, but this is TINY.
customer_reviews.author: KIFARU

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed .. individual colors are so small I find it hard to even use any eyeshadow brush with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My eyeshadow was broke. Tiny pieces everywhere :""( maybe next time it will be packed to secure it
customer_reviews.author: yesenia collado

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Love Mac Amber 9 Times colors and received on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: You can always rely on Mac to make a good product- but it does need to be touched up now and then.
customer_reviews.author: GSevera

customer_reviews.title: As much as I love this eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love this eye shadow, being the first time ordering it, I was expecting the pallets to be larger. I am keeping because I love the MAC makeup, it does not irritate my skin the way other brands do. Next time I will make sure I order the Pro size, they are larger in size.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is super tiny for the 40 dollar price and the colors aren't saturated I believe it to be a mac nock off they have a heavy fallout for a mac eyeshadow and I have a 10 dollar essence opalette.from ulta that doesn't have as heavy fallout as this pallette and not to be able to return for that price.is redoculpus will not purchase anything from seer again didn't know i could have.purchased from belk and returned it feels.lime a cheap knockoff.im taking to belk to check but will never order from seller again should always be able to.refund cosmetics
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Penix

customer_reviews.title: Happy With the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved MAC eyeshadows. This one does not seem to last as long as my last one throughout the day, but I love it nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Prisna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while for the package to arrive but it worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These shadows are difficult to work with in my opinion. The don't pick up on a brush very well. I have to use my finger to get it to work. It is buildable so that is a plus since the first finger swipe doesn't seem to get the greatest color pay off. I feel this way about all of these that I have tried. I don't know why I keep trying although they are good for traveling since they are very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amber LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: I was sad that the pallette is soooo small for that money ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn it yet.I was sad that the pallette is soooo small for that money I spent.I hope it looks great on.To expensive.I probably won't purchases again
customer_reviews.author: Drumcat Fano

customer_reviews.title: ... my girlfriend a couple months ago and she really liked them as a random gift just to show I
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend a couple months ago and she really liked them as a random gift just to show I cared
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and arrived only to be an extreme disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The color pallets were scratched and broken as if they were used and the center color was missing from the case altogether. The item was "non-returnable" but supposed to be a high quality item. The price was high but if it was what it should have been, would have been ok. This was a gift and arrived only to be an extreme disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl a mosley

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, heavily pigmented eyeshadow, some very unique and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, heavily pigmented eyeshadow, some very unique and flattering shades. I use it every day. It makes green eyes pop.
customer_reviews.author: ges

customer_reviews.title: MAC eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Wife as a birthday present. She loves it. But I will say that it is much better priced from the MAC web sight, $40.
customer_reviews.author: Hank & Steph

product_meta.title: Mac Eye Shadow X 9: AMBER TIMES NINE
product_meta.description: MAC;Eyes On MAC Collection - Eye Shadow x 9;Amber Times Nine - Includes: Cozy Grey (Cool Grey - Matte), Kitties (Pale Bronze - Frost), Georgia Peach (Dirty Rose Pink - Matte), Ricepaper (Peachy Gold With Shimmer - Frost), Creative Copper (Light beige - Lustre), Cork (Muted Golden Brown - Satin), Don't Tell (Sparkly Brown - Lustre), Aromatic (Matte Brown - Matte) and Pepper Please (Sparkly Bronze Copper Brown - Velvet).;0.8g each
feature_bullets: MAC Eye Shadow X 9 AMBER TIMES NINE
